channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Parasite/Host (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
Goal: Kill major factions You exist in two forms: parasite and host. You start the game as the host.
Host form: Passive: Survive death once. (same as the inquisitor's one) Day ability(Spread): Choose a target to infect with your parasite. You now exist as the Parasite and your original body will die tonight. (Twice) Night ability: Attack someone(Twice)
Parasite form: Passive: While inside a target, you can read his/her whispers, night chats and obtain night feedback. You can not affect your target's actions/abilities. Passive: You and your target will survive death once but you die in two days in this form. Night ability: Take control of your target and become the host.
